attributes.additional_details:
The government must reduce or completley stop sending hard earning tax payers money to aid other governments in places like zimbabwe,nigeria.

we all know this money doesnot reach the intended receipents and is squandered by the residing governments in place in these countries.

we look like a laughing stock and these countries must rub their hands together each year when the handouts come flooding in.

you must stop this or dramatically reduce the enormous amounts we send over and concentrate on our own problems, we have vetod the eu and should be out , now stop given out handouts to these so called benefit cheats as we actively pursue cheats here. this one is blatant as hell chaps.
